name: Roasted Boar with Dornish Wine Sauce
description: Wild boar slow-roasted with herbs and finished with spiced wine reduction, as served at King Robert's last feast

description: Creamy risotto with saffron and crystallized rose petals from the Tyrell gardens

name: Northern Wild Duck Pie
description: Flaky pastry filled with wild duck, winter vegetables, and herbs from beyond the Wall

name: Braavosi Mushroom Towers
description: Stacked exotic mushrooms with herbs and garlic, inspired by the Titan of Braavos

name: Frey Wedding Pigeon Pie
description: Traditional wedding pie filled with pigeon and bacon, served with rich gravy

name: Dothraki Blood Pie
description: Spiced meat pie made with lamb and exotic spices from the Great Grass Sea

description: Northern root vegetables roasted with herbs and butter, served with crusty bread

name: Casterly Rock Golden Pheasant
description: Roasted pheasant glazed with honey and saffron, worthy of Lannister gold

name: Dragon Egg Spiced Soup
description: Creamy pumpkin soup with fire-roasted peppers and exotic spices

name: Ironborn Salted Cod Cakes
description: Crispy fish cakes made with salted cod, paying the iron price

name: Red Wedding Wine-Poached Pears
description: Pears poached in mulled wine with winter spices and honey

name: Wildling Venison Stew
description: Hearty stew of wild venison with root vegetables and forest mushrooms

description: Roasted chicken glazed with honey and lemon, served with golden raisins

description: Warm spiced bread pudding with dried fruits and vanilla custard

description: Grilled snake meat marinated in spices and served with fiery sauce

name: Vale Mountain Trout
description: Fresh mountain trout stuffed with herbs and lemon, wrapped in bacon

description: Dark chocolate and weirwood berry pudding with a mysterious swirl pattern
